name: Citizen of Rome - Dynasty Ascendant
detailed_description:
Citizen of Rome - Dynasty Ascendant is a sandbox role playing/management offline game where you control a character and their family in the Mid-Republic era of the Roman Republic

Get to experience life and events in the Roman Republic and help your family rise to greatness and perhaps even take up Consulship and control of the Republic and lead Rome to greater glory

Gameplay features:


  • Fully offline, no ads, no in-app purchases
  • Marriage, Birth, Death, and Succession
  • Property and economy
  • Several key Roman festivals
  • Traits and Skills
  • Education
  • Apprenticeships and employment
  • Elections and Class progression
  • Random interactions and events
  • Achievements
  • Dark Mode

Long live the Republic!

short_description: Experience life and events in the Roman Republic. Help your family rise to greatness and lead Rome to greater glory. Long live the Republic!
reviews:
“Amazing game, love Roman history and this is a nice way to learn new things! Keep up the amazing work”
5/5 – Winston Moses

“Very fun and addicting game!”
5/5 – Ivan Gonzalez

“I was enjoying it quite a bit. Had 2 dead wives and 3 dead kids by age 52 but such is life haha.”
ShylockSimmonz

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: SSE2 capable Intel Pentium 4 or later
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 128MB of RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 or above
  • Processor: Intel 64 bit
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 128MB of RAM

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS | Fedora 21 | Debian 8
  • Processor: SSE2 capable Intel Pentium 4 or later
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 128MB of RAM
